00005 NetworkList::NetworkList(QWidget* parent)
00006     : QListView(parent)
00007 {
00008     setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00009     connect(this, SIGNAL(activated(QModelIndex)),
00010             SLOT(slotActivated(QModelIndex)));
00011     connect(this, SIGNAL(doubleClicked(QModelIndex)),
00012             SLOT(slotDoubleClicked(QModelIndex)));
00013     connect(this, SIGNAL(entered(QModelIndex)),
00014             SLOT(slotEntered(QModelIndex)));
00015     connect(this, SIGNAL(pressed(QModelIndex)),
00016             SLOT(slotPressed(QModelIndex)));
00017     connect(selectionModel(), SIGNAL(currentChanged(QModelIndex,QModelIndex)),
00018             SLOT(currentChanged(QModelIndex,QModelIndex)));
00019 }

00051 NetworkList::List
00052 NetworkList::findItems(const QString& name, Qt::MatchFlags flags) const
00053 {
00054     NetworkList::List list;
00055     QModelIndexList tmpList = model()->match(model()->index(0, 0), NetworkListItem::NameRole, name, -1, flags);
00056 
00057     foreach (const QModelIndex& index, tmpList) {
00058         list << static_cast<NetworkListItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00059     }
00060 
00061     return list;
00062 }

00077 NetworkList::row(NetworkListItem* item) const

00082 void
00083 NetworkList::setCurrentNetwork(NetworkListItem* network)
00084 {
00085     setCurrentNetwork(network, QItemSelectionModel::SelectCurrent);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void
00089 NetworkList::setCurrentNetwork(NetworkListItem* network, QItemSelectionModel::SelectionFlags command)
00090 {
00091     const int count = _model->networkList().count();
00092     for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00093         if (network == _model->networkList().value(i)) {
00094             setCurrentRow(i, command);
00095             return;
00096         }
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 void
00101 NetworkList::setCurrentRow(int row)
00102 {
00103     setCurrentRow(row, QItemSelectionModel::SelectCurrent);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void
00107 NetworkList::setCurrentRow(int row, QItemSelectionModel::SelectionFlags command)
00108 {
00109     QModelIndex index = _model->index(row, 0);
00110     if (!index.isValid()) {
00111         return;
00112     }
00113 
00114     selectionModel()->setCurrentIndex(index, command);
00115     emit currentRowChanged(row);
00116     emit currentTextChanged(index.data(Qt::DisplayRole).toString());
00117 }

00119 void
00120 NetworkList::sortItems(Qt::SortOrder order)
00121 {
00122     _model->sort(0, order);
00123 }

00125 NetworkListItem*
00126 NetworkList::takeItem(int row)
00127 {
00128     NetworkListItem* item = static_cast<NetworkListItem*>(_model->index(row, 0).internalPointer());
00129     _model->removeNetwork(item);
00130     return item;
00131 }

00133 void
00134 NetworkList::setModel(NetworkListModel* model)
00135 {
00136     if (static_cast<NetworkListModel*>(this->model()) == model) {
00137         return;
00138     }
00139 
00140     removeSignals(static_cast<NetworkListModel*>(this->model()));
00141     QListView::setModel(model);
00142     addSignals(model);
00143     emit modelChanged(model);
00144 }
00145 
00146 void
00147 NetworkList::addSignals(NetworkListModel* model)
00148 {
00149     Q_UNUSED(model);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void
00153 NetworkList::removeSignals(NetworkListModel* model)
00154 {
00155     Q_UNUSED(model);
00156 }

00158 void
00159 NetworkList::currentChanged(const QModelIndex& current, const QModelIndex& previous)
00160 {
00161     NetworkListItem* curr = static_cast<NetworkListItem*>(current.internalPointer());
00162     NetworkListItem* prev = static_cast<NetworkListItem*>(previous.internalPointer());
00163     emit currentNetworkChanged(curr, prev);
00164 }
